prompt: Set of cute minimalist illustrated avatar portraits (head-only), flat vector-ish style with soft grain texture, rounded shapes, subtle pastel accents (lavender/indigo), clean outlines, friendly comedic vibe, NOT photorealistic, no text, centered face, transparent background. Variations should look like different people (different hairstyles, skin tones, glasses, facial hair).
